english_example_sentence: The fast runners in the new park always look cheerful.
russian_example_sentence: Быстро бегущие в новом парке всегда выглядят весёлыми.
turkish_example_sentence: Yeni parktaki hızlı koşanlar, her zaman neşeli görünürler.
